weaponInfo.zone: Look at a vehicle in a parking zone to check its current parking time
weaponInfo.click: Left click on a vehicle to issue a parking fine

outstandingFeeQuery.title: Warning
outstandingFeeQuery.text: You are required to pay your outstanding fees of :money: in order to use a parking meter.

violations.parkingMeterUnpaidOrOvertime: Parking at a parking meter without paying, or for longer than the paid time
violations.parkingZoneOvertime: Parking too long in a parking zone
violations.doubleParking: Double parking (multi-space parking / parking parallel to a car already parked at a curb)
violations.privateProperty: Parking on private property without permission
violations.wrongDirection: Parking facing against the direction of traffic
violations.tooCloseToIntersection: Parking in, too close to or within an intersection, railroad crossing or crosswalk

notifications.fineIssued: A parking fine has been issued against you.
notifications.finePaid: A parking fine issued against you has been paid.
notifications.fineForceRemoved: A parking fine issued against you has been removed by an admin.
notifications.mustBeOwnerToView: You must be the owner of this vehicle!
notifications.mustBeOwnerToPayParkingMeter: You must be the owner of the parked vehicle!
notifications.vehicleHasFine: The parked vehicles' fine must be paid first!
notifications.cantAffordZone: You can't afford to pay the zone fees, you will have to pay them next time.
notifications.cantAffordPendingFees: You can't afford to pay your pending fees, you will have to pay them next time.
